front.title: Use of GOST signature algorithms in DNSKEY and RRSIG Resource Records for DNSSEC

abstract.t: This document describes how to produce signature and hash using GOST algorithms for DNSKEY, RRSIG and DS resource records for use in the Domain Name System Security Extensions (DNSSEC, RFC 4033, RFC 4034, and RFC 4035). V.Dolmatov Expires May 10, 2010 [page 1]
